sub_title: Senior Manager - EY | Leadership | Strategy | Sustainability | Transformation
summary: I have a drive to make the world a better place. I do that on a daily basis at home, in my work and as a volunteer. I have extensive experience in the service industry (Finance, Telecom, Education, and Government). My expertise is in the field of responsible and sustainable business, responsible investment, strategy (execution), and (change) management challenges. I have gained a lot of international experience as a business- and program manager, consultant and entrepreneur. My qualities: Open, realistic, sensitive, thinker and do-er, coaching leadership, managing on clear results, pragmatic, humor, people-person.

profile_positions.title: Senior Manager - EY Sustainability and Strategy

profile_positions.description:
Global activities: Working on Purpose, Sustainability Strategy, Materiality analysis, Business Environment Scan, Integrated Annual Reporting, Communications, External Stakeholder Management

BU Netherlands activities: As the sustainability lead for Aegon Nederland
profile_positions.title: Corporate Sustainability Strategy manager

profile_positions.description: I am responsible for our Responsible & Sustainable Business (CSR/Sustainability) Strategy. I work directly with the board, Aegon Corporate HQ, business units, suppliers, customers, regulators and sector representatives and lead the delivery of value on this strategy to reach our SDG’s and KPI’s. My activities: strategy development, trends, communication and reputation, ESG/responsible investment policy, active stewardship as an asset owner, reporting, leading (international) projects, engagement with suppliers and customers and improvements in cooperation with our Data Analytics team. I contribute to our integrated reporting process and I lead the Responsible Business Team within Aegon NL. Key results: Implemented the Responsible Business strategy including SDG’s and KPI reporting cycle, new Responsible investment governance and policy, active role in Spitsbergen ambition / Climate agreement, set up reporting/accounting project, specific focus and activation on climate change and the environment
profile_positions.title: Strategic Lead Responsible Business

profile_positions.description: As member of the Strategy and Change Office of Aegon NL i am accountable for our Responsible and Sustainable Business Strategy, this includes CSR, Responsible Products and Services, Responsible Investment and a Sustainable approach towards our People and the Environment. Next to that i am working on different strategic initiatives e.g. our 2020 cost program.
profile_positions.title: Head of Responsible Business / Corporate Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Within Aegon my role is:
1. Accountable for the succesful execution of Strategic Aegon NL programs
-> Business Transformation Manager for Business Unit Income, Manager of Agile Product Owner Team
2. Responsible for the succesful execution of our Responsible Business Strategy (CSR), management of our virtual Responsible Business Teams (1. Products/Services/Customers, 2.HR 3. Responsible Investment)

As a Talent Coach i am equiped to coach people to focus on their talents and make the next necessary step in life.

company.name: Protenstant Church Nootdorp Ypenburg - Helping Developing Countries & People

volunteer_experiences.description: As the chairman of the commission "Helping Developing Countries & People" i was responsible for the strategy definition, the collection of funds, the selection of projects, the networking with external partners and board member of the governing board of Protest Church Nootdorp Ypenburg.

Overall objective of the project: fight cancer in Indonesia by:
1. developing "simple and effective" diagnosis techniques and deploy them in Indonesia
2. create an effective infrastructure in organisation and IT to assure the future of the program
